    • Uses of Transform in org.apache.juneau.dto.jsonschema

      Subclasses of Transform in org.apache.juneau.dto.jsonschema 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Schema.BooleanOrSchemaArrayTransform
      Used during parsing to convert the additionalItems property to the correct class type.
      static class  Schema.BooleanOrSchemaTransform
      Used during parsing to convert the additionalProperties property to the correct class type.
      static class  Schema.JsonTypeOrJsonTypeArrayTransform
      Used during parsing to convert the type property to the correct class type.
      static class  Schema.SchemaOrSchemaArrayTransform
      Used during parsing to convert the items property to the correct class type.

    • Uses of Transform in org.apache.juneau.transform

      Subclasses of Transform in org.apache.juneau.transform 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AnnotationBeanTransform<T>
      Bean transform constructed from a @Bean annotation found on a class.
      class  BeanTransform<T>
      Parent class for all bean transforms.
      class  InterfaceBeanTransform<T>
      Simple bean transform that simply identifies a class to be used as an interface class for all child classes.
      class  PojoTransform<N,T>
      Used to convert non-serializable objects to a serializable form.
      static class  PojoTransform.NULL
      Represents no transform.
      class  SurrogateTransform<T,F>
      Specialized PojoTransform for surrogate classes.
      static class  Transform.NULL
      Represents no transform.
      Methods in org.apache.juneau.transform that return Transform 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Transform Transform.setBeanContext(BeanContext beanContext)
      Sets the bean context that this transform instance was created by.
      Methods in org.apache.juneau.transform with parameters of type Transform 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean Transform.isSameAs(Transform f)
      Checks if the specified transform class is the same as this one.

    • Uses of Transform in org.apache.juneau.transforms

      Subclasses of Transform in org.apache.juneau.transforms 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  BeanStringTransform<T>
      Transforms beans into Strings by simply calling the Object.toString() method.
      class  ByteArrayBase64Transform
      Transforms byte[] arrays to BASE-64 encoded Strings.
      class  CalendarLongTransform
      Transforms Calendars to Longs using Calender.getTime().getTime().
      class  CalendarMapTransform
      Transforms Calendars to Maps of the format {_class:String,value:long}.
      class  CalendarTransform
      Transforms Calendars to Strings.
      static class  CalendarTransform.ISO8601DT
      Transforms Calendars to ISO8601 date-time strings.
      static class  CalendarTransform.ISO8601DTZ
      Same as CalendarTransform.ISO8601DT, except always serializes in GMT.
      static class  CalendarTransform.Medium
      Transforms Calendars to DateFormat.MEDIUM strings.
      static class  CalendarTransform.RFC2822D
      Transforms Calendars to RFC2822 date strings.
      static class  CalendarTransform.RFC2822DT
      Transforms Calendars to RFC2822 date-time strings.
      static class  CalendarTransform.RFC2822DTZ
      Same as CalendarTransform.RFC2822DT, except always serializes in GMT.
      static class  CalendarTransform.Simple
      Transforms Calendars to simple "yyyy/MM/dd HH:mm:ss" strings.
      static class  CalendarTransform.ToString
      Transforms Calendars to Strings using the Date.toString() method.
      class  DateLongTransform
      Transforms Dates to Longs.
      class  DateMapTransform
      Transforms Dates to Maps of the format {value:long}.
      class  DateTransform
      Transforms Dates to Strings.
      static class  DateTransform.ISO8601DT
      Transforms Dates to ISO8601 date-time strings.
      static class  DateTransform.ISO8601DTP
      Same as DateTransform.ISO8601DT except serializes to millisecond precision.
      static class  DateTransform.ISO8601DTPNZ
      Same as DateTransform.ISO8601DT except serializes to millisecond precision and doesn't include timezone.
      static class  DateTransform.ISO8601DTZ
      Same as DateTransform.ISO8601DT, except always serializes in GMT.
      static class  DateTransform.ISO8601DTZP
      Same as DateTransform.ISO8601DTZ except serializes to millisecond precision.
      static class  DateTransform.Medium
      Transforms Dates to DateFormat.MEDIUM strings.
      static class  DateTransform.RFC2822D
      Transforms Dates to RFC2822 date strings.
      static class  DateTransform.RFC2822DT
      Transforms Dates to RFC2822 date-time strings.
      static class  DateTransform.RFC2822DTZ
      Same as DateTransform.RFC2822DT, except always serializes in GMT.
      static class  DateTransform.SimpleDT
      Transforms Dates to simple "yyyy/MM/dd HH:mm:ss" strings.
      static class  DateTransform.SimpleDTP
      Transforms Dates to simple "yyyy/MM/dd HH:mm:ss.SSS" strings.
      static class  DateTransform.SimpleT
      Transforms Dates to simple "HH:mm:ss" strings.
      static class  DateTransform.SimpleTP
      Transforms Dates to simple "HH:mm:ss.SSS" strings.
      static class  DateTransform.ToString
      Transforms Dates to Strings using the Date.toString() method.
      class  EnumerationTransform
      Transforms Enumerations to List<Object> objects.
      class  IteratorTransform
      Transforms Iterators to List<Object> objects.
      class  ReaderTransform
      Transforms the contents of a Reader into an Object.
      static class  ReaderTransform.Html
      Reader transform for reading HTML text.
      static class  ReaderTransform.Json
      Reader transform for reading JSON text.
      static class  ReaderTransform.PlainText
      Reader transform for reading plain text.
      static class  ReaderTransform.Xml
      Reader transform for reading XML text.
      class  XMLGregorianCalendarTransform
      Transforms XMLGregorianCalendars to ISO8601 date-time Strings.
